title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned maximum

1— Correct molar concentration based on graph ~ 0.32M (0.3M to 0.5M)

1— Explanation: When y = 0, no change in mass = no net water movement = isotonic = solute concentration inside egg and outside egg are the same
descriptions:

2 points are earned maximum

1— Correct molar concentration based on graph ~ 0.32M (0.3M to 0.5M)

1— Explanation: When y = 0, no change in mass = no net water movement = isotonic = solute concentration inside egg and outside egg are the same

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 points are earned maximum

1— Correct molar concentration based on graph ~ 0.32M (0.3M to 0.5M)

1— Explanation: When y = 0, no change in mass = no net water movement = isotonic = solute concentration inside egg and outside egg are the same

2 points are earned maximum
